alert.note: Alert for La Paz (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Dust Advisory issued June 25 at 4:18PM MST until June 25 at 5:15PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: The National Weather Service in Phoenix has issued a * Dust Advisory for... Central La Paz County in west central Arizona... * Until 515 PM MST. * At 417 PM MST, blowing dust from west of Quartzsite to south of Vicksburg has been observed by webcams along Interstate 10. HAZARD...Less than one mile visibility with strong wind in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...ADOT Webcams. IMPACT...Hazardous travel. * This includes the following highways... AZ Interstate 10 between mile markers 14 and 52. US Highway 60 between mile markers 31 and 52. AZ Route 72 between mile markers 45 and 49. Locations impacted include... Quartzsite, Vicksburg, Brenda and Vicksburg Junction. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Blowing dust brings reduced visibility, leading to dangerous driving conditions. If driving, avoid blowing dust if possible. If caught in dense blowing dust, pull off the road, turn off your lights and keep your foot off the brake.
